item.title: Delight customers with a seamless payments experience
item.caption: Give your customers the gift of modern, frictionless, painless payments. Integrate Paystack once and let your customers pay you however they want.
item.caption2: We automatically route payments through the most optimal channels, ensuring the highest transaction success rates in the market.
item.link: Find out how we achieve high success rates

item.title: Build custom payments experiences with well-documented APIs
item.caption: Developers love our thorough, well-documented APIs that let you to build everything from simple weekend projects, to complex financial products serving hundreds of thousands of customers. If you can imagine it, you can build it with Paystack.
item.list1: Collect one-time and recurring payments from your app or website
item.list3: Retrieve all your transaction and customer data

item2.title: Protect yourself and your customers with advanced fraud detection
item2.title2: Detailed reporting for accounting, reconciliation, and audits
item2.caption: Paystack’s combination of automated and manual fraud systems protect you from fraudulent transactions and associated chargeback claims.
item2.caption2: Understand your customers’ purchase patterns and do easy reconciliations with a robust data Dashboard and easy exports.
